title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2022 Statement on the Situation in Ukraine (12/10/2022)
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 12 October 2022.
content:

As of this morning, there were 28 missiles, of which 20 were shot down. More than 15 drones, almost all of them are Iranian combat drones. Most were shot down.
